resources.string: The following file has been created:
Are you sure there\'s an SD card in the phone? Could not create

Are you sure you want to import tasks from a CSV file? Your current tasks won\'t be deleted and the app will try to merge the tasks and tags in an intuitive way.\n\nHowever, the CSV structure should start with: task name, task completion and tag/category. If you\'re not sure your file matches this, you can try to import anyway, the app will tell you.
A CSV file hasn\'t been found, or the SD card isn\'t in the phone.
This file doesn\'t have a compatible structure :S
Only one file has been found
You can\'t delete the last tag,\nbut you can rename it from the menu.\n
The todo list couldn\'t be backed up on the SD card for some reason. Are you sure there\'s an SD card in there?
You can\'t move a task under itself or a subtask of itself.
The todo list couldn\'t be imported for some reason. Are you sure there is a backup on the card, or that an SD card is inserted?
Click a star to add that tag. Click the tag name to go to that tag. The italic tag is the task\'s primary tag.
You can only add multiple tags to unindented tasks. In case they have subtasks, the multiple tags will be applied to the entire hierarchy of tasks.
Some kind of an error appeared.
Type a name for the new tag:
Type a new name for the tag:
Type a new name for this task:
You can now type the note. The text box will increase as you type.
Are you sure you want to delete this tag? All the tasks in this tag will be lost.
Are you sure you want to delete all the tasks in this tag? They will be permanently lost.
Are you sure you want to import a backup from the SD card? Your current todo list will be permanently lost.

Tasks are organised into tags, which can be selected in the upper spinner.

To handle tags (creation, deletion, renaming) you can use the general menu.

To create tasks you just need to click the 'Add' button at the bottom. For a task-specific menu, long-click a certain task.

You can also use keyboard shortcuts. Press K now if you want to check them out.

---Task handling:
Next=N, Previous=P
Add=A, Delete=D
Edit or Rename = E or R,
Audio note=F
Graphical note=G
Written note=W
Move to another tag=M
Push down=0
Menu for selected task=SPACE
Show all the tasks=SHIFT+T

---Tag handling:
Same as before (N,P,A,D,R) + ALT
Show all the tags=T
Clear all the tasks=X
1,2,...,9 to open a specific tag

---General:
Help=H, Stats=S
Configuration=C
'Visually Challenged' mode=V
Import backup from SDcard=B
Change to-do list size limit=O,I
See due tasks only=U
'Ok' or 'Use' or 'Yes'=ENTER
'Cancel' or 'No'=DEL
Record up to 50s of audio on the SD card
Note activity can\'t start :-/\nAre you sure there\'s an SD card in the device?\n
Press here to see the due tasks
January February March April May June July August September October November December

This screen shows you tasks that are due today or earlier.

You can go back to the normal todo list view by pressing 'Go back'.

Also, you can access this screen from the normal view by pressing the U key.

Just letting you know about a feature that you\'re going to see in action soon. There\'s a checked tasks limit which is set to 100 by default. It means the app automatically removes checked tasks so you don\'t have to delete them yourself (there won\'t be more than 100 checked tasks).\n\nThis message appeared because the next checked task will reach the limit :)
Confirm (the app will perform an online login and sync all the tasks with due dates)
Login and data synchronization successful. Every time a task with a due date will be added, the app will connect to the internet and add it to the Google Calendar.\n
Although the login was successful, the app wasn\'t able to synchronize the tasks.\n
For some reason the login failed. Check the username/password and the availability of an internet connection.\n
This limit prevents the app from keeping more than so many checked tasks. When the limit is reached, the app automatically deletes the oldest checked tasks.
Some people prefer to fine tune task priority, some prefer a simpler system with fewer levels (e.g. 5).
The task font size will be this big.
This is the so called padding of the task. Very small values for this might make some descriptive texts under tasks look cropped.
How many seconds before this audio alarm should shut up?
(experimental) Synchronize tasks with due dates to Google Calendar
Backup todo list on SD card every time the app closes
Visually distinguish tasks by their priority
Allow anonymous collection of usage stats once a month
Show which task has notes in portrait mode as well
Invert task theme (dark text on white background) - needs app restart
Show due time for tasks that have it
Remove top system bar & make the app truly fullscreen - needs app restart
Disable edit screen ad - needs app restart
I\'m not using priority. Remove the priority bar in the edit screen.
Instead of a message in the notification bar, show the alarm as a Snooze/Dismiss screen
This is the last alarm for this task!
Here, for example, you can add work-related tasks
no more tasks in this tag
Music Cinema Movies Amazon Android Travel Gifts
